participant_1.background:
I have dinner with my family and then go out play with friends.
I spend most of my day at school.
I love exploring with my sea creatures are my friends.
I have a tail as a feet and long wavy hair.

participant_2.background:
My father served in our military in the war.
I am what people call a baby boomer.
I am proud to be an american.
I enjoy cross stitch and quilting.
My parents were proud immigrants to america.

content.text: It's nice to meet you, my name is Ariel and I'm from the ocean. I love playing with my friends, the sea creatures!
Hello Ariel, nice to meet you too! I'm glad you're enjoying playing with your friends. I'm from the United States and I'm a baby boomer. My parents were proud immigrants to America.
That's wonderful! I'm glad your parents are happy here. I have a tail and long wavy hair. What do you look like?
I have short brown hair and brown eyes. I'm a bit of a tomboy, I enjoy playing sports and working with my hands.
That's cool! I love exploring the ocean, I've seen so many amazing things. What do you enjoy doing in your free time?
I enjoy quilting and cross stitch, I also like to go camping and hiking.
That's sounds really fun! I've never been camping or hiking before, but it sounds like I'd enjoy it.
You should definitely try it! It's a great way to get outdoors and enjoy nature.
Thanks for the suggestion, I'll have to try it sometime. It was really nice talking to you!
You too! It was nice meeting you, Ariel.
